item.title: Character Introduction
item.description: Navigation character "Satoko" Her trademark is the silhouette of her haircut, which is shaped like a musical noteâ™ª She has a positive attitude. She is improving her skills by trying difficult sound games. It appears when there is a tutorial or announcement. Check the credits for information on the character designer. The following illustrations are the preliminary design and rough sketches for the application. Design proposal Rough sketch
